select * from bu_base_job_info where 1=1 <#if query??> <#-- -------------------关键字查询开始 --------------- --> <#if query.key??> <#assign key = StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)/> and (
base_job_id like '%${key}%' or
base_job_name like '%${key}%' or
create_user like '%${key}%' or
update_user like '%${key}%'
) </#if> <#-- -------------------关键字查询结束 --------------- -->
<#-- -------------------综合查询开始 --------------- -->
<#if query.ids??> and id in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.ids)}) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.code??> and base_job_id = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}' </#if>
<#if query.name??> and base_job_name = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}' </#if>
<#if query.createTimeBegin?? && query.createTimeEnd??> and date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeBegin)}' and '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createTimeEnd)}' </#if>
<#if query.createUser??> and create_user = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.createUser)}' </#if>
<#if query.updateUser??> and update_user = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.updateUser)}' </#if>
<#-- -------------------综合查询结束 --------------- --> </#if>
